column1: Kata Robata////Two girlfriends and I came here last week for happy hour/dinner and to check the new place out. Warning: happy hour ends at 6:30 pm. Since we arrived shortly after 6
column2: we had to rush and order off the happy hour menu. The waitress was nice
column4: and let us order another round of drinks at the happy hour price ($7 a drink) and waited to bring them out until we were finished with the ones we had. The email I had received about this place advertised "street food" stalls on the back patio
column5: which is kept cool with misters
column6: however that wasn't available when I went.
